a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of primary-school-age children who are out of school vs. GDP per
Children out of school are the percentage of primary-school-age children who are not enrolled in primary or secondary school.
Children out of school (% of primary school age)
Data source: UNESCO (via World Bank), Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
